_header: Adam our father was in bliss
_description: The Prophets of the Old Testament — a song of ten quatrains with Latin caudae and burden: ‘O flos de lesse virgula / Laus tibi sit et gloria’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Adam our fader was in blis& for an appil of lytil
                    prys…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…He brynge vs alle to good endeIn die
                    nouissima
